node.name: Riverhaven, Carousel Family Services
node.description: A series of guarded arches line the southern wall. The complicated framework of iron and timbers spans across the ceiling. Countless gears, pulleys and weights form the strikingly complex mechanism which drives the Carousel.

node.name: Underground Passage, Storage
node.description: Vibrant orange lichen grows out of the bluish algae that covers most of the stone encompassing this overstuffed storage room. Crates and barrels abound, their contents safely nailed shut within, while rust-covered steel racks line the walls, holding a variety of jarred items. The room holds a heavily spiced scent that nearly obscures the ever-present dank odor of the passage.

node.name: Hidden Den
node.description: In striking counterpoint to the passage outside, the walls of this chamber are smooth and lined with plush fabrics that show no signs of mildew despite the dampness that pervades even in here. Tall wrought iron poles, reaching nearly to the ceiling, bear both lanterns for illumination and sachets of aromatics to sweeten the air. Several chairs, opulent though mismatched, are situated around a low stone serving-table filled with food and drink.

node.name: Cavern, Driftwood Library
node.description: Rather dry, the simple cavern has a thick layer of several carpet rugs thrown over the floor, and small torches burn on the wall, lighting up the area quite well. Several large bookshelves are arranged in a couple rather haphazard rows, and appear to be made out of reclaimed shipping crates. A simple desk stands in the front of the cavern for returns, and several chairs are set out for easy reading.

node.name: Cold Laboratory, Hallway
node.description: Built into what looks like a former sewer, the narrow hallway has curved metal walls and is dimly lit by torches mounted in makeshift stands on either side. Dry wooden planks cover the floor and provide a sturdy footing, secured firmly in place by large metal bolts. The air is extremely cold in the area, leaving bits of frost on the slightly rusted walls.

node.name: Cold Laboratory, Hallway
node.description: Built into what looks like a former sewer, the narrow hallway has curved metal walls and is dimly lit by torches mounted in makeshift stands on either side. Dry wooden planks cover the floor and provide a sturdy footing, secured firmly in place by large metal bolts. Strange patterns of delicate frost have formed on the walls, tracing out circles and spirals that hint at complex magical devices behind the rusty metal.

node.name: Cold Laboratory, Hallway
node.description: Built into what looks like a former sewer, the narrow hallway has curved metal walls and is dimly lit by torches mounted in makeshift stands on either side. Dry wooden planks cover the floor and provide a sturdy footing, secured firmly in place by large metal bolts. The hallway dead-ends at a solid piece of flat metal, likely a cap to the large metal pipe that makes up the walls.

node.name: Cold Laboratory, Work Station
node.description: The air is quite chilly, cold enough to leave ice crystals with every breath. A medium-sized and rather functional laboratory is set up, with a central marble table as the main feature. Nearby, a row of cold lockers is designed to store specimens for later use, and a tray of very clean tools is set up near the table.

node.name: Cold Laboratory, Work Station
node.description: The air is quite chilly, cold enough to leave ice crystals with every breath. A medium-sized and rather functional laboratory is set up, with a central marble table as the main feature. Nearby, a row of cold lockers is designed to store specimens for later use, and a tray of very clean tools is set up near the table.

node.description: The air is quite chilly, cold enough to leave ice crystals with every breath. Nearby, a row of cold lockers is designed to store specimens for later use, and a tray of very clean tools is set up near the table.

node.name: Riverhaven Outfitting Society, A Private Outfitting Room
node.description: A pure-white wainscoted hall is topped by lilac-hued paisley painted walls. Occupying the back third of the room is a solid-looking loom, while a large spinning wheel sits near the entrance. Resting atop a deep purple rug is a sturdy worktable and a comfortable, wicker chair. Running parallel along opposing walls are several hooks and shelves, holding practically every conceivable tool, spool of thread, bobbin, thimble and scrap.

node.name: Riverhaven, Rundmolen Post Office
node.description: Tucked away in a corner of the square is a wide stone counter set into the conical carousel beneath an angled metal awning. Vast, countless rows of differently sized shelves are visible within, and the intricate Dwarven mechanisms that shuffle the vaults also rearrange the package-covered storage. Clerks shuffle endlessly back and forth between the counters and shelving as they assist patrons with their packaging and mailing needs.

node.name: Riverhaven Forging Society, A Private Forge
node.description: Thick walls struggle to contain the blistering heat of the workshop where the fires blaze endlessly night and day. The flickering flames give a reddish glow to the racks and shelves of tools and equipment, all neatly placed and ready for use. Workers enter in their protective gear from time to time, checking the equipment and reporting back to a sentry at the entry.

node.name: Riverhaven Enchanting Society, A Private Enchanting Room
node.description: Pieced together by a seemingly blind worker, the walls are covered with scraps of rugs, blankets, and carpets in a kaleidoscope of colors. A burly, light pink feldspar table is stashed in a corner of the room, providing plenty of room to work.

node.name: Riverhaven Alchemy Society, A Private Alchemy Room
node.description: A large workbench dominates one side of the room with numerous pieces of alchemical equipment scattered haphazardly upon its surface. The high, vented windows provide relief from the common, yet unpleasant, smell that permeates the room.

node.name: Riverhaven Engineering Society, A Private Engineering Room
node.description: A fine layer of wood and stone shavings covers most of the well-worn granite floor. The white walls have seen better days, and black and grey scuff marks adorn much of the open space. A large workstation along one wall is unnaturally free of clutter and holds several organized tools and implements. Grunts, curses, and labored breathing from other patrons echo throughout the large workroom.

node.name: Riverhaven Forging Society, Bulk Metals
node.description: A small counter and clerk sit beneath a tarp strung across the alley of Silvermoon Road. Carts and wagons trickle through at a relaxed but steady pace. The drivers hand over paperwork which the clerks quickly review, stamp and pass along to teams of workers. With practiced efficiency, the workers navigate rows of pre-assembled pallets to retrieve and load the proper materials. Two quick raps on the wagon signal that the order is complete, and the driver prods his beasts into motion to make way for the next in line.
